name: ArtistEditionControlsV2
description: Artists self minting for KnownOrigin (KODA) * Allows for the edition artists to mint there own assets and control the price of an edition * https://www.knownorigin.io/ * BE ORIGINAL. BUY ORIGINAL.

eventDecorators.name: PriceChanged
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: EditionGifted
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: EditionDeactivated
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: Pause
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: Unpause
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipRenounced
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

functionDecorators.name: enablesDeactivation
functionDecorators.description: Enables the ability to deactivate editions from the this contract Only callable from owner.

functionDecorators.name: unpause
functionDecorators.description: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore. Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: pause
functionDecorators.description: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state.

functionDecorators.name: updateEditionPrice
functionDecorators.description: Sets the price of the provided edition in the WEI Only callable from edition artists defined in KODA NFT contract Only callable when contract is not paused Reverts if edition is invalid.

functionDecorators.name: pauseDeactivation
functionDecorators.description: Disables the ability to deactivate editions from the this contract Only callable from owner.

functionDecorators.name: setKodavV2
functionDecorators.description: Sets the KODA address Only callable from owner.

functionDecorators.name: gift
functionDecorators.description: Ability to gift new NFTs to an address, from a KODA edition Only callable from edition artists defined in KODA NFT contract Only callable when contract is not paused Reverts if edition is invalid Reverts if edition is not active in KDOA NFT contract.

functionDecorators.name: deactivateEdition
functionDecorators.description: Sets provided edition to deactivated so it does not appear on the platform Only callable from edition artists defined in KODA NFT contract Only callable when contract is not paused Reverts if edition is invalid Reverts if edition is not active in KDOA NFT contract.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
